text:
September 5, 1956
Mr. Tom Hall, Jr.
Assistant to the Director
of Public Relations
Wofford College
Spartanburg, South Carolina
Dear Mr. Hall*
Attached is a list of our Manuals and materials available. We shall be glad to
provide the items you need at the prices indicated. You 11 note that several
production workshop reports are available.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
HJSidfc
